# HiPeople Assignment - Image Store

This is an image store that allows the upload and retreival of images using a simple API interface.

## Requirements

```go```

## How to run

Simply run ```go run main.go``` inside the root directory. API will be available at ```localhost:8080```

# API Endpoints

## Get image by name

Method: ```GET /?image=IMAGENAME.png```

### Examples

#### :thumbsup: Found image by name :thumbsup:

#### Request
```GET /flying_bird```

#### Response

```Status 200 OK```

```Content-Type: application/octet-stream```

![Hello World](data:image/png;base64,)


#### :thumbsdown: image not found :thumbsdown:


#### Request
```GET /image=IMAGENAMEThatDoesNotExist.png```
#### Response
```Status 404 Not Found```

## Upload image
Method: ```POST /```

###### Maximum image size allowed is 32MB

### Examples

#### :thumbsup: Successful image upload :thumbsup:

##### Body: ```form-data```

```Key: image```

```Value: flying_bird.png```

 ![Hello World](data:image/png;base64,)

#### Response
```Status 200 OK```
```json
flying_bird(0).png
```

#### :thumbsdown: Invalid file extension :thumbsdown:

#### Request
```POST /```

##### Body: ```form-data```

```Key: image```

```Value: text_file.txt```
#### Response
```Status 400 Bad Request```
```json
file extension is not allowed
```
